text: Nimage tiḷidirali, ihalōkada badukembudu kēvala āṭa, vinōda, alaṅkāra, nim'ma naḍuvaṇa paraspara jambha mattu santāna hāgū sampattina spardhe mātravāgide – maḷe suridāga raitanige tanna beḷe candagāṇuvante. Ā baḷika adu oṇagalārambhisuttade mattu nīvu nōḍuttiddanteyē adu (beḷe) haḷadiyāguttade mattu konege cūru cūrāgi biḍuttade. Atta, paralōkadalli (ondeḍe) kaṭhiṇa śikṣeyū ide mattu (innondeḍe) allāhana kaḍeyinda kṣame hāgū prasannateyū ide. Ihalōkada baduku kēvala van̄caka sādhanavāgide
